content: भाव्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भूण्यत्] {@--1@} About to be or happen; <ab>oft.</ab> used impersonally like भवितव्यं <ab>q. v.</ab>; किं तैर्भाव्यं मम सुदिवसैः <ls>Bh. 3. 41.</ls> {@--2@} Future. {@--3@} To be performed or accomplished. {@--4@} To be conceived or imagined. {@--5@} To be proved or demonstrated. {@--6@} To be determined or investigated. --व्यं {@--1@} What is destined or sure to happen in the future. {@--2@} Futurity.
